dmca.title: RADIO ONLINE Registered Trademark
dmca.body:
Mark,

My name is Ron Jones.  I am the Managing Partner of RADIO ONLINE L.L.P., an 
online subscription service serving the commercial radio broadcasting 
industry continuously since 1989, and the owner of the service mark "RADIO 
ONLINE," which is registered in our name on the Princple Register of the 
United States Patent and Trademark Office, namely registration number 
3081846. We are also the the trademark holder of radioonline.com.

In addition to operating radioonline.com, RADIO ONLINE L.L.P. is an 
independent news agency and information provider that maintains a series of 
"RADIO ONLINE" branded web sites and electronic news feeds. These web sites 
include radioonlinenews.com, amfmradioonline.com, findradioonline.com, 
goradioonline.com, listenradioonline.com, newsradioonline.com, 
publicradioonline.com, top40radioonline.com and shopradioonline.com, just to 
name a few. 

I had the opportunity to visit your web site today and noticed that "RADIO 
ONLINE" was incorporated as part its logo, the operating name and domain 
name. This is an infringement on our trademark and will likely result in 
confusion, as well as diluting the distinctive quality, of the "RADIO ONLINE" 
service mark. U.S. trademark law prohibits the use of a mark or name that is 
likely to cause consumer confusion, and/or dilution of a famous mark.

RADIO ONLINE L.L.P. has expended considerable efforts and resources to build 
up the goodwill in its registered service mark, name, electronic 
communications vehicles and its many branded web sites. Your use of 
classicradioonline.com is very likely to cause confusion to our consumers, 
and/or dilution of our service mark -- which in this case is also a brand 
name that was created in 1989 and predates the World Wide Web.

It is for these reasons that RADIO ONLINE L.L.P. is directing you to 
immediately ceast and desist the use of "RADIO ONLINE" in the name of your 
web site. We also seek the deactivation of, and ultimately discontined public 
use of, classicradioonline.com for any web site or electronic communications. 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation in this matter, and I look forward 
to your immediate reply.

Sincerely,

Ron Jones, Managing Partner 
RADIO ONLINE L.L.P. 
ronjones@radioonline.com 
http://www.radioonline.com 
http://www.radio-online.com 
http://www.radioonlinenews.com 
Voice: (806) 352-7503
Fax:   (806) 352-3677
